title: performance regression between release.2011-02-15 and release-2011-02-24
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Run goray <http://sourceforge.net/projects/goray/>; with the Suzanne model.

What is the expected output?
goray was running in 10 seconds

What do you see instead?
goray is running in 30 seconds

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g/6l

Which operating system are you using?
Mac OS X

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
322350d6fdbf release/release.2011-02-24

Please provide any additional information below.

Associated discussion thread:
http://groups.google.com/group/golang-nuts/browse_thread/thread/811c51147f2fc888

I isolated the problem to Go revision 73af7584f8, so it appears to have something to do
with the newly added NOSPLIT stack check.
